title: Recruiting for Ranked Team "Heart Of the Emperor" (Silver-gold)
body:
Roles to be Filled

Application Layout 

IGN: Mistaken

Main Role: jungle

Main Champion: Kha'Zix, Lee-Sin, Nautalis, Rek'sai , Rengar

How often you're on: 11am-2am, Everyday.

Rank: Gold 3

Age:17

Skype: Yes

What brings you to try out for Heart Of the Emperor : Eg,  To improve as a player and acquire valuable teamwork skills.

replies.body:
IGN: n1ghtmare

Main Role: adc

Main Champion: jinx, draven, graves and ezreal

How often you're on: 4pm onwards most days.

Rank: Gold 2

Age:23

Skype: Yes

What brings you to try out for Heart Of the Emperor : enthusiastic to play some 5's, get a structured team a little better than solo queue. keen for competitiveness and just a team that plays 5's a lot actually. that's what id like

IGN: Mistaken

What brings you to try out for Heart Of the Emperor : To look for dedication to a team to improve everyday or everytime we play.

Note: Please accept request have a few questions :)

I can play any roles BUT adc.

IGN: Frostwolf77

Best to worst: Top,Mid,Supp,jung ......... adc.

i pick depending on team/enemy picks - Sion, Shen, Malzahar, Brand, Blitz, Leona, etc.

I'm ususally on at nights (for weekdays) and all day for weekends. May wary temporarily if I have a big test/exam coming up.

i play all roles!

lmk man would be happy to try for your team :) just add me
